attributes.action: MPs to have the final say on EU Brexit deal. Must include an option to Remain.
attributes.background: The majority of UK people did not vote for Brexit. As more information emerges, MPs should make the final decision. Three choices. 1. To leave with the deal negotiated. 2. To leave without a deal. 3. To Remain. If no absolute majority, the least popular choice is deleted and a revote is carried out.
